ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Leverages the functionality of 'clipboard.js', a JavaScript library for HMTL5-based copy to clipboard from web pages (see <https://clipboardjs.com> for more information), and provides a reactive copy-to-clipboard UI button  component, called 'rclipButton', for 'shiny' R applications.

Leverages the functionality of 'clipboard.js', a JavaScript library for HMTL5-based copy to clipboard from web pages (see <https://clipboardjs.com> for more information), and provides a reactive copy-to-clipboard UI button  component, called 'rclipButton', for 'shiny' R applications.

name: r-rclipboard
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.2.1" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-rclipboard
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/rclipboard_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/rclipboard/rclipboard_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 023153f184db1ecf379301fc3da5fe827a4ee76b1b95daa007aff5127719b2a1

build:
  number: 2
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-shiny
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-shiny

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('rclipboard')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('rclipboard')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://github.com/sbihorel/rclipboard
  license: MIT
  summary: Leverages the functionality of 'clipboard.js', a JavaScript library for HMTL5-based copy to clipboard from web pages (see <https://clipboardjs.com> for more information), and provides a reactive copy-to-clipboard UI button  component, called 'rclipButton', for 'shiny' R applications.
  license_family: MIT

  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT
    - LICENSE
extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: rclipboard
# Title: Shiny/R Wrapper for 'clipboard.js'
# Version: 0.1.2
# Author: Sebastien Bihorel
# Maintainer: Sebastien Bihorel <sb.pmlab@gmail.com>
# Description: Leverages the functionality of 'clipboard.js', a JavaScript library for HMTL5-based copy to clipboard from web pages (see <https://clipboardjs.com> for more information), and provides a reactive copy-to-clipboard UI button  component, called 'rclipButton', for 'shiny' R applications.
# Depends: R (>= 3.3.0)
# License: MIT + file LICENSE
# Encoding: UTF-8
# LazyData: true
# URL: http://github.com/sbihorel/rclipboard
# BugReports: http://github.com/sbihorel/rclipboard/issues
# Imports: shiny
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2019-07-02 14:09:16 UTC; sebastien
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2019-07-02 16:00:07 UTC
